Adjusting your bike seat can make a big difference in your riding comfort.

Remember to check the bike's manual or online resources for specific instructions on how to adjust the seat height and position. You might also want to consider consulting with a professional bike mechanic if you're not sure how to make the adjustments.

Proper bike fit is essential for comfort, efficiency, and even safety. Make sure to also check the handlebar height, pedal position, and other components to ensure a comfortable and ergonomic riding position.

Now, back to your roof rack decision... Have you considered the installation process for the Thule Evo and Yakima FullBack? Both systems have different installation requirements, and you might want to factor that into your decision.
